name: Joe Aguado
bio: Joe Aguado is a seasoned professional with a background in Financial Advisory and Business Administration Management. Transitioning into the realm of technology, he now excel as a Full Stack Web Developer, proficient in both front-end and back-end development. Their diverse expertise enables them to bridge the gap between business strategy and technical implementation, delivering innovative solutions for modern challenges.

name: Christine Hoang
bio: Christine Hoang is a versatile professional adept at juggling roles as a Full Stack Developer and Product Manager. With a keen eye for detail and a commitment to quality assurance, they ensure that every project meets the highest standards. Known for their empathetic leadership style, Christine leads her teams with kindness and compassion, fostering a collaborative environment where everyone can thrive.
